definition: smart move/clever way of doing sth
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess

sentences.english: The headmaster adults still have what reserch coup?
sentences.chinese: 校長大人還有什麼治學妙招？

sentences.english: But thanks to its gargantuan energy consumption, that's no silver bullet either.
sentences.chinese: 但由於其巨大的能源消耗，也不算是什麼妙招。

definition: a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
to give advice/to make a suggestion/to help out
brocade sack of miracle plans (idiom); bag of tricks/fiendishly cunning masterplan (written out by strategic genius of fiction, and given to the local commander in a brocade bag)
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
the key trick/the secret of success
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
good medicine/effective prescription/fig. good plan/effective strategy
